title: Roche to buy U.S. biotech group Adheron Therapeutics
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
ZURICH, Oct 9 (Reuters) - Swiss drugmaker Roche will acquire U.S. biotech group Adheron Therapeutics in a deal worth up to $580 million that... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
